text: Angelo Carlo Chendi (10 July 1933 â€“ 12 September 2021) was an Italian cartoonist. In 1952, Chendi began writing hundreds of stories with characters from Disney comics. Chendi was born in Ferrara, Italy. Chendi died on September 12, 2021, at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Carlo Chendi Inducks Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian comics artists Category:Italian cartoonists
